verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to thee that <S%H7703>spoilest,<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> wast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7703>spoiled;<s%> and dealest <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> and they dealt not <S%H898>treacherously<s%> <S%H3808><s%> with thee! when thou shalt <S%H8552>cease<s%> to <S%H7703>spoil,<s%> thou shalt be <S%H7703>spoiled;<s%> and when thou shalt make an <S%H5239>end<s%> to deal <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> they shall deal <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with thee.

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> unto us; we have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for thee: <S%H1961>be<s%> thou their <S%H2220>arm<s%> every <S%H1242>morning,<s%> our <S%H3444>salvation<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

At the <S%H4480>noise<s%> <S%H6963><s%> of the <S%H1995>tumult<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5074>fled;<s%> at the lifting <S%H4480>up<s%> <S%H7427><s%> of thyself the <S%H1471>nations<s%> were <S%H5310>scattered.<s%>

And your <S%H7998>spoil<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> like the <S%H625>gathering<s%> of the <S%H2625>caterpillar:<s%> as the running to and <S%H4944>fro<s%> of <S%H1357>locusts<s%> shall he <S%H8264>run<s%> upon them.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7682>exalted;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H7931>dwelleth<s%> on <S%H4791>high:<s%> he hath <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

And <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H530>stability<s%> of thy <S%H6256>times,<s%> and <S%H2633>strength<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation:<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is his <S%H214>treasure.<s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> their valiant <S%H691>ones<s%> shall <S%H6817>cry<s%> <S%H2351>without:<s%> the <S%H4397>ambassadors<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> shall <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H4751>bitterly.<s%>

The <S%H4546>highways<s%> lie <S%H8074>waste,<s%> the wayfaring <S%H5674>man<s%> <S%H734><s%> <S%H7673>ceaseth:<s%> he hath <S%H6565>broken<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> he hath <S%H3988>despised<s%> the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> he <S%H2803>regardeth<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H582>man.<s%>

The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H56>mourneth<s%> and <S%H535>languisheth:<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> is <S%H2659>ashamed<s%> and hewn <S%H7060>down:<s%> <S%H8289>Sharon<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> like a <S%H6160>wilderness;<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> and <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> shake <S%H5287>off<s%> their fruits.
Now <S%H6258><s%> will I <S%H6965>rise,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> will I be <S%H7311>exalted;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> will I lift up <S%H5375>myself.<s%>
Ye shall <S%H2029>conceive<s%> <S%H2842>chaff,<s%> ye shall bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H7179>stubble:<s%> your <S%H7307>breath,<s%> as <S%H784>fire,<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> you.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H4955>burnings<s%> of <S%H7875>lime:<s%> as <S%H6975>thorns<s%> cut <S%H3683>up<s%> shall they be <S%H3341>burned<s%> in the <S%H784>fire.<s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> ye that are far <S%H7350>off,<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I have <S%H6213>done;<s%> and, ye that are <S%H7138>near,<s%> <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> my <S%H1369>might.<s%>

The <S%H2400>sinners<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> are <S%H6342>afraid;<s%> <S%H7461>fearfulness<s%> hath <S%H270>surprised<s%> the <S%H2611>hypocrites.<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> among us shall <S%H1481>dwell<s%> with the <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> among us shall <S%H1481>dwell<s%> with <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H4168>burnings?<s%>

He that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> <S%H6666>righteously,<s%> and <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H4339>uprightly;<s%> he that <S%H3988>despiseth<s%> the <S%H1215>gain<s%> of <S%H4642>oppressions,<s%> that <S%H5287>shaketh<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> from <S%H4480>holding<s%> <S%H8551><s%> of <S%H7810>bribes,<s%> that <S%H331>stoppeth<s%> his <S%H241>ears<s%> from <S%H4480>hearing<s%> <S%H8085><s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H6105>shutteth<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H4480>seeing<s%> <S%H7200><s%> <S%H7451>evil;<s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> on <S%H4791>high:<s%> his place of <S%H4869>defense<s%> shall be the <S%H4679>munitions<s%> of <S%H5553>rocks:<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> him; his <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall be <S%H539>sure.<s%>
Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H2372>see<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> in his <S%H3308>beauty:<s%> they shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> that is very far <S%H4801>off.<s%>

Thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1897>meditate<s%> <S%H367>terror.<s%> <S%H346>Where<s%> is the <S%H5608>scribe?<s%> <S%H346>where<s%> is the <S%H8254>receiver?<s%> <S%H346>where<s%> is he that <S%H5608>counted<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4026>towers?<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H3267>fierce<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> of a <S%H6012>deeper<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> than thou canst <S%H4480>perceive;<s%> <S%H8085><s%> of a <S%H3932>stammering<s%> <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> that thou canst <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H998>understand.<s%>

Look <S%H2372><s%> upon <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> of our <S%H4150>solemnities:<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H7600>quiet<s%> <S%H5116>habitation,<s%> a <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> that shall <S%H1077>not<s%> be taken <S%H6813>down;<s%> <S%H1077>not<s%> one of the <S%H3489>stakes<s%> thereof shall <S%H5331>ever<s%> be <S%H5265>removed,<s%> <S%H1077>neither<s%> shall <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H2256>cords<s%> thereof be <S%H5423>broken.<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H117>glorious<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will be unto us a <S%H4725>place<s%> of broad <S%H5104>rivers<s%> and <S%H2975>streams;<s%> wherein shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H1077>no<s%> <S%H590>galley<s%> with <S%H7885>oars,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H117>gallant<s%> <S%H6716>ship<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> thereby.

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is our <S%H8199>judge,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is our <S%H2710>lawgiver,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is our <S%H4428>king;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> us.

Thy <S%H2256>tacklings<s%> are <S%H5203>loosed;<s%> they could <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H3653>well<s%> <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> their <S%H8650>mast,<s%> they could <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> the <S%H5251>sail:<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> is the <S%H5706>prey<s%> of a <S%H4766>great<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%> <S%H2505>divided;<s%> the <S%H6455>lame<s%> <S%H962>take<s%> the <S%H957>prey.<s%>

And the <S%H7934>inhabitant<s%> shall <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> I am <S%H2470>sick:<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein shall be <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
